name: tm49
effect: Teaches Snatch to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Echoed Voice to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Snatch Gen II: Fury Cutter Gen I: Tri Attack)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, its power is increased.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, its power is increased.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks the target with great power. However, this also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense stats.
